modShortDescription: A light weight mod that displays a rough percentage of health on your targets. This version uses the latest texture that Telric created in a19, the blue one.
modDescription:
A light weight mod that displays a rough percentage of health on your targets. This only appears after you have damaged them. This version uses the latest texture that Telric created in a19, the blue one.

**Video (from another mod in progress, comparing the two health bars):**

Does not require restart.

Tested and works with Alpha 20.4 (b42).

Requires client to install as well as server.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Fixed an issue with double health bars for vultures on the healthbars mods. No need to restart world or anything.
* Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/s2cnzk03b3zbotz/TelricsHealthBarsV2A20.zip?dl=1)** for A20  
**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/m1q473e6tgwr42d/TelricsHealthBars3.0.zip?dl=1)** for A19

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26175-telrics-a20-modlets-new-mod-added-12152021/).

**Credits:** [Telric](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/telric/)
